sections.title: Operator / Legal Entity
sections.content: TRAVI World (https://travi.world) is operated by KBR Global Creative Consulting Ltd, a private company limited by shares incorporated in Gibraltar (Company No. 125571) with its registered office at: Suite 4.3.02, Block 4, Eurotowers, Gibraltar GX11 1AA.

sections.title: Purpose & Scope of Use
sections.content: TRAVI World is a digital media and editorial platform dedicated to travel and tourism content. We publish travel-related news, destination guides, attraction reviews, hotel information, and curated outbound links to third-party service providers.

sections.title: Affiliate Disclosure
sections.content: Some links on the Website are affiliate links. If you click an affiliate link and subsequently make a purchase or booking, we may earn a commission at no additional cost to you.

sections.title: AI-Generated Content
sections.content: This Website operates autonomously using artificial intelligence (AI) systems. Content is automatically collected, generated, translated, and published by AI tools with limited human oversight.

sections.title: User Conduct
sections.content: By using the Website, you agree not to use it for any unlawful purpose, infringe intellectual property rights, interfere with the Website infrastructure, or engage in unauthorized scraping.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: Unless otherwise credited, all original content on the Website is the intellectual property of KBR Global Creative Consulting Ltd.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, we shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the Website.

sections.title: Governing Law
sections.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Gibraltar.

sections.title: Data Collection
sections.content: We collect minimal personal data. When you subscribe to our newsletter, we collect your email address. We use analytics to understand site usage.

sections.title: Cookies
sections.content: We use essential cookies for site functionality and analytics cookies (Google Analytics) to understand how visitors use our site.

sections.title: Data Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share anonymized analytics data with our partners.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. Contact us at info@travi.world for any data requests.

sections.title: How do I book a hotel through TRAVI?
sections.content: Simply search for your destination, browse available hotels, and click 'Book Now' on your preferred option.

sections.title: Can I cancel or modify my booking?
sections.content: Yes, most bookings can be cancelled or modified. Check the cancellation policy on your booking confirmation.

sections.title: How do I leave a review?
sections.content: After your trip, you'll receive an email invitation to leave a review. You can also log into your account.

sections.title: Is TRAVI available in my country?
sections.content: TRAVI is available worldwide! We support multiple languages and currencies.

sections.title: How can I become a TRAVI contributor?
sections.content: We're always looking for passionate travel writers! Send us your portfolio through the contact form.
